Blog.post: "What Kind Of Tear Are You?[Emotional][going to add pictures]" - Youre A Black Tear, and You have alot of depression going on in your life, you might result to selt mutilation. sream in your pillow and cry in the corner of your room, you feel like everyone is after you. or that you have no-where to go. [i can relate] but the best thing to do is to let it all go.just break free. go for a walk, write poetry. or talk to someone you trust.just remember there is always someone who loves you, no-matter how horrible it may seem to be unloved, or how bad you feel it. how heavy it might be, there is always someone there...
"What's Your Personality?" You have a Pure Personality, it means that you are very nice and friendly!

"Are You Beautiful?!" Yes..You are beautiful and you have pure beauty! Everyone has different looks.(apart from twins):p But It is definately not whats outside that count, its all inside! things that come from the heart! If you help and give people there needs and love people, then your a caring person and arent afraid to show who you are!

"What genre of rock are you?" Emo! You're very in touch with your emotions and that's what I like about you! It's all about the music for you... I have pity for your tortured soul...you're just like me...

my dream that i will start a band and course i be the singer and we get discovered. or that i will get discovered or something. my brother always told me, i will be famous becuse he has fith in me i have tried alot of new things. but the one thing i will stick to is singing adn if anyone is listening to this help my dream become reality. thank you buh bye till next time

"What kind of girl are you?" A GAME-BOY. Youre like a tomboy without the love of sports. Reality sucks, but as long as you have your electronics you feel you can cope. Time goes unnoticed when youre locked in your room hooked up to your Nintendo, rocking to your favourite collection of guitar-driven albums. Your virtues: Intelligence, sense-of-humour, individuality. Your flaws: Inability to cope with real life, action-freak spirit, reclusive nature. Your Personality type is the only type that would like this cool online gothic Game: www.life-blood.vze.com

You have a surprise kiss! Your partner is always pleasantly pleased to have you jump outta no where to dote them with a fun peck on the cheek or more passionate embrace. super markets and work places are your favorite places to attack your loved one with all your love

What Kind of ANGEL are you? (For Girls only) This Quiz has amazingly Beautiful Pictures!" Your half- angel. Not exactly human, but not quite angel, you walk on earth freely. Half-Angels have no wings, but tend to show some signs. Some ways to notice these are that the girl never menstrates, she cannot bleed, and her touch seems to give of a glow. No one really knows how half-angels are born. Some say that when a child is born, one of the angels blesses her with her gifts. Others say that they are cursed creatures, because half-angels cannot die, while their familly and friends around them do. Hlaf-Angels are very beautiful and Kind, and have the power to speak to animals, but at the same time, sad that they are this way. Some Half-Angels love being human. Being able to see, smell, hear, taste,and feel are all miracles to them. They crave to be more human-all the time. What type of vampire are you?" Pedophile's Dream Vampire "What's your sexual appeal?" Innocent What 80's cartoon r u?" You are the Pound Puppies

You're the sad smile,the one that regrets nearly everything and is constantly wondering about what could have been.You're not happy with your situation and usually blame yourself because of the bad things that have happened.Cheer up.
